definition: to amass/to accumulate/to store/measured quantity (such as area of volume)/product (the result of multiplication)/to integrate (math.)/to solve (or integrate) an ordinary differential equation (math.)/old/long-standing
to store up/to grow (e.g. a beard)/to entertain (ideas)

sentences.english: A fortune - teller flimflamed her out of her savings.
sentences.chinese: 一个算命的将她的积蓄骗光了。

sentences.english: He contributed half of his savings to the relief fund.
sentences.chinese: 他将积蓄的一半捐献给救济基金会。

sentences.english: He had never dreamed that the fund of human knowledge bulked so big.
sentences.chinese: 他从没想到人类知识的积蓄竟会如此汗牛充栋。

sentences.english: For years, Spindler survived mostly off savings from his consulting work.
sentences.chinese: 多年来，他主要依靠原先做咨询工作时的积蓄过日子。

sentences.english: You can make money if you put your savings into conservative investments.
sentences.chinese: 用积蓄进行保守性投资的话，你会赚钱的。

sentences.english: My mother never withdraws her savings to buy unnecessary things.
sentences.chinese: 母亲从不支出积蓄去买多余之物。

sentences.english: Is not this laid up in store with me, and sealed up among my treasures?
sentences.chinese: 这不都是积蓄在我这里，封锁在我府库中吗？

sentences.english: Collecting my energy for one last push, I was eating a chocolate bar when along pedalled two 15-year-olds.
sentences.chinese: 为了积蓄能量做最后冲刺，我吃了一块巧克力。

sentences.english: By those odd jobs she even have a saving.
sentences.chinese: 通过这些工作，她甚至已经有了一笔积蓄。

sentences.english: He spent all his saving buying that house after his own heart.
sentences.chinese: 他用所有的积蓄买了那个特别合他心意的房子。

sentences.english: He used up all your savings and now he's gone.
sentences.chinese: 他用光了你的积蓄，连个人影儿都找不到了。

sentences.english: Don't throw away your savings on shares that will be worthless in a few years.
sentences.chinese: 别把你的积蓄浪费在几年后就不值一文的股票上去。

sentences.english: Zhang says that she brought more money to the partnership, from her Wall Street savings.
sentences.chinese: 张说，她带来了一些华尔街积蓄的钱入伙。

sentences.english: Afore - mentioned all expense basically relies on two people's current stockpile to finish.
sentences.chinese: 上述的所有开销主要依靠两人目前的积蓄来完成。

sentences.english: She was tricked out of all her savings.
sentences.chinese: 她被骗走了所有的积蓄。

sentences.english: He has bought the house that he especially like with his all saving.
sentences.chinese: 他用所有的积蓄买了那个特别合他心意的房子。

definition: to save bit by bit/to accumulate
to live frugally/to economize on food and clothing/to scrimp and save
lit. build a high desk of debt (idiom); heavily in debt
to exhaust/to use up/to deplete/to drain
to save on food and clothing (idiom); to live frugally
